taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section setosi;species jejunus;

treatment.description: More slender than no. 141, the canes with more slender prickles 2-3 mm. long; rhombic-oval or elliptic-obovate leaflets subacute; axis of inflorescence and short (up to 1.5 cm. long) pedicels prickly; petals 7 mm. long, 3.5-5 mm. broad; fruit 7-8 mm. broad, of few drupelets.
